title: third year
content:
Hello seniors! 
I have a few questions regarding third year

1) How do we study the common subjects( DBMS, Machine Learning , Software Engineering) 

2) Do we get a two month break at the end of third year( after sixth sem) 

3) When does the placement season usually begin and tips for how to prepare

comments.body:
For SE there will be more than enough content in the slides, you can use the reference books if you wish to learn more but from an exam point of view, PESU slides are sufficient. Machine learning is pretty basic but if you want an edge, you can complete the Andrew Ng course on coursera. although i think you probably know of it, completing that course is a canon event in every ML oriented student's life. For DBMS, you'll have some kind of assignments. We used to have weekly coding assignments and they were pretty good. spend some time on them, i didnt and thats probably why my grade was less than stellar. 

Yes, you get a two month break at the end of third year.

From what we know, placements usually begin by July end. I could give you the same old tips to prepare ( Leetcode, contests, yadda yadda) but I'll let someone more experienced answer that. our placements season starts this july.
